headline: Disney Leadership And Communications Shift Puts Focus On Streaming Story
summary: Walt Disney (NYSE:DIS) Senior Executive Vice President and Chief Communications Officer Kristina Schake is scheduled to leave the company in March 2026. Her departure is set to coincide with CEO Bob Iger’s exit and the planned leadership handover to incoming CEO Josh D’Amaro and incoming President and Chief Creative Officer Dana Walden. Schake has overseen communications during Disney’s major strategic shifts, including proxy battles, streaming initiatives and leadership transitions. For...
